xmlText.p: PHILADELPHIA PHILLIES — Agreed to terms with RHP Francisco Rodriguez on a minor league contract.
AGUA CALIENTE CLIPPERS — Acquired F Dakarai Allen from the available player pool.<
COLORADO AVALANCHE — Recalled F Dominic Toninato and Ds David Warsofsky and Andrei Mironov from San Antonio (AHL).
NEW YORK RANGERS — Assigned D Sergey Zborovsky from Hartford (AHL) to Greenville (ECHL).<
BELLEVILLE SENATORS — Returned D Willie Corrin and Jamie Doornbusch on loan to Brampton (ECHL).
SPRINGFIELD THUNDERBIRDS — Returned G Branden Komm on loan to Manchester (ECHL).
SYRACUSE CRUNCH — Returned F Stephen MacAulay on loan to Florida (ECHL).
TORONTO MARLIES — Recalled G Cal Heeter and F Max Novak from Orlando (ECHL).<
ECHL — Suspended Cincinnati LW Alex Kile one game.
ATLANTA GLADIATORS — Claimed D Eric Shand off waivers from Rapid City.
BRAMPTON BEAST — Released G Carmine Guerriero and D Mackenzie Braid and Jake Flegel.
ORLANDO SOLAR BEARS — Released G Brett Epstein as emergency backup. Added G Greg Ozubko as emergency backup.
TOLEDO WALLEYE — Signed F Mike Embach.<
NWSL — Announced the Boston Breakers will cease operations, effective immediately.<
MISSOURI — Suspended junior G Terrence Phillips indefinitely from the men's basketball team.
